pr_title: ISPN-11300 Add internal metadata to cache entries

timeline.message: ISPN-11300 Add internal metadata to cache entries

timeline.bodyText: I'm not a fan of this approach. I think it hurts readability and the benefits of the read/write methods will soon be lost with the removal of the Externalizers
timeline.author: ryanemerson

timeline.bodyText: This is not a public method, so there's no reason to keep the old signature around
timeline.author: danberindei

timeline.bodyText: Yes, it can be removed, I'm actually removing it in #8136

timeline.bodyText: 🔪, it's only used by a test.

timeline.bodyText: So there's an extra 80-64=16 bytes even when the MetaParamsInternalMetadata isn't used?
